body:
Comment 11 by **bubblboy**: 
Well, that is interesting: it works perfectly, now. Thank you a big many! How did you 
know about this $GOARM variable? It might be a good idea to put this somewhere in the 
installation documentation on golang.org, along with the src/all-arm.bash script (is 
that even necessary? what is the difference with all.bash?), if that information is 
not there yet. If it is, my apologies for not finding it :/

Even using the fmt package works fine, by the way.

Thanks again!

Greetings,

Hraban Luyat
